name: Save your soul (MyLittleBlog.fr)
description:
"Your soul awakens at the gates of hell ...

And yes, you died, how? Why ? By who ? You don't know anymore!

The only thing you know is get out of here fast! Besides, where is it here? What's this ? A nightmare ?

In addition, your only abilities are to run stupidly, jump and turn around at every obstacle like a lemming donkey!

Would you be tirelessly drawn to your destiny?"
